segments.text: What exactly is the problem with the latest lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are faced with the problem that part of the consignment is unacceptable . We assume that damage occurred during the consignment was in your care .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we can't accept your damage claim .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You didn't note the damage on the bill of lading .
segments.speaker: S1
